tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Monstercat - 008 - Anniversary Album Mix! (Album Now Available on iTunes!)
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: JOIN US IN #OperationDethrone - Full info here: bit.ly Buy the album on iTunes and submit your sales receipt to receive a 2nd FREE 008 Album in Lossless Quality (Bandcamp). Keep it or expose Monstercat to a friend! Download from iTunes here: bit.ly Submit Receipts here: bit.ly Remember...your purchase directly supports your favourite artists! Can't use iTunes? Bandcamp: monstercatmedia.bandcamp.com ● Why purchase the album? - Your purchase is paid directly to your favourite artists! - Revenue earned is invested into production equipment, touring equipment, new software and visuals - Allows artists to quit their day jobs to focus on music production and their careers! -20 Tracks + 1hr Album mix for $10 is a DEAL! Purchase here: bit.ly ● Visuals by Beeple Download these clips and more now at www.beeple-crap.com Facebook facebook.com Twitter: twitter.com Check out the brand new Monstercat website! A lot of hard work was put into it and we're very proud of the product! Visit it at monstercat.com ● TONS OF NEW MERCH! store.monstercat.com ---------------------------------------------------------------- Mix by Going Quantum: ● Tracklist: 00:00 Skifonix - People Say (feat. Stella Talpo) youtu.be 02:46 Hot Date! & Insan3Lik3 - Clocks (Feat. Chrisson) youtu.be 06:30 Eminence - Ocean City youtu.be 10:34 Televisor - Life (feat. Iris) youtu.be 12:25 Pegboard Nerds - Rocktronik youtu.be 15:26 Chris Ramos - Emergency (feat. Natasha Waterman) youtu.be 17:44 Rogue - Dynamite youtu.be ...

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: The transitions on 007 were better﻿ indeed
i would kill﻿ to see that comment
I cant beleive i spent an hour staring at this with my headphones on.﻿ Time Well Spent!
I thought your name was different people.﻿ My bad
clearing my ears﻿ after listening to the shit on the radio XD
what did he say :P, comment deleted ﻿
He fails? Have you looked at﻿ your name...
